Thanks for the up. I know it's not your fault that BoB put the subs or subliminal whatever in this but after finishing the third season I gotta say that the flashing subs at the bottom of the screen really are annoying. I tried to remove them but no can do with toolnix.

It's so HARD ?

Don't think there's any need to be so thin skinned and to take an attitude about this. Using VLC Player is OK if you are watching this on a PC but I like to watch on my TV. I use a flash drive and just plug into the TV. Can't eliminate the flashy subs that way and I can't take them out beforehand - just sayin' for others who might like to know.
